titles: Enchiridion locorum co[m]muniu[m] aduersus Lutheranos Ioanne Eckio autore ... ; ab autore iam quarto recognitu[m] & tribus locis auctum, & a pluribus mendis calcographi emunctum.
author: Eck, Johann, 1486-1543.
notes: Imperfect: tightly bound; torn with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.
